response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only stands as a testament to our dedication but also comes with a unique set of features that could potentially revolutionize your experience. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $18,000. Should you decide to accept this offer, you'll be among the first to experience its unparalleled benefits. Let's make this opportunity yours today!", "product_price": 18000}
